parameters.name: caseinfo
parameters.value: {'name': '更新报警组', 'base_url': '${get_base_url(base_url)}', 'request': {'url': '/api/v1/alarmfolder/update', 'method': 'put', 'json': {'id': '${get_extract_data(Alarm_Folder_ID)}', 'parentId': None, 'name': '修改报警文件${get_random_number(1,1000)}', 'nodeType': 0, 'sort': 1, 'children': []}, 'headers': {'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=UTF-8', 'X-Project': '${get_extract_data(x_project)}'}}, 'validate': [{'equals': {'status_code': 200}}, {'equals': {'nodeType': 0}}, {'contains': 'id'}]}

labels.name: story
labels.value: 接口名称：更新报警文件夹
